EmailTemplate.name: SD Promoting Positive Behaviour Course
EmailTemplate.subject: Take our online Promoting Positive Behaviour course
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Here at Supply Desk, we're committed to providing our teachers and support staff with a full and varied CPD programme, which is why we're always working to provide new training materials.
As such, we are delighted to be able offer you access to our new online Promoting Positive Behaviour course, created in-house by our education specialists.
You'll find the full course here:
https://supplydesk.co.uk/promoting-positive-behaviour/story.html
You should allow approximately 30 minutes to complete the course, including all quiz sections.
Upon completion, you will be given a link to your downloadable certificate, which you can print and fill in for your own records.
We hope you enjoy it!
Kind Regards, Supply Desk
